item.title: Join us on Tumblr
item.description: You can easily track whatâ€™s happening at IVRPowers by following us on Tumblr. Keep up to date about the most advanced RTC and IVR solutions and breakthrough technologies. Follow us at http://blog.ivrpowers.com/

item.title: Follow us on Twitter
item.description: Be sure to follow us on Twitter with great brand updates, promotions and news about all things RTC or IVR. Our hand is @ivrpowers and our favorite hashtags right now are #RTC and #IVR. Give us a shout out! https://twitter.com/ivrpowers
